selections.name: Itsukushima
selections.reason: Track specialist who won well here last start. Despite the heavy weight (62kg), he rates highest on recent figures and maps to get a good run.

selections.name: Blakmax
selections.reason: Drops in class from BM70 to BM66. Highest rated horse in the field (70) and represents the class runner.

selections.name: Phineas
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished 3rd to Itsukushima last start. Meets him better at the weights.

selections.name: Super Solar
selections.reason: Veteran who draws the rail. Can run a cheeky race for the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Blakmax
danger_horse.reason: Significant class drop makes him a major threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Celsius Star
selections.reason: Clear class runner (Rating 84) dropping from BM84 to BM78. Consistent form in higher grades makes him the one to beat.

selections.name: Laa De Sha
selections.reason: Progressive type (Rating 79) coming off a win at Sale. The main danger with upside.

selections.name: Lim's Bighorn
selections.reason: Solid rating (77) and competitive in this grade. Place chance.

selections.name: Capper Thirtynine
selections.reason: Draws the inside and has a competitive rating (76) to fill the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Laa De Sha
danger_horse.reason: In winning form and on an upward ratings trajectory.

selections.name: Dance The Boogie
selections.reason: Experience counts in 2yo races. Ran 2nd on debut and should improve.

selections.name: Pain Au Chocolat
selections.reason: Maher stable debutant. Watch betting moves closely.

selections.name: Dirty Harry
selections.reason: Hayes stable debutant. Well-bred and draws a good gate.

selections.name: Flash Of Class
selections.reason: Walker stable runner resuming. Showed ability in jumpouts.

danger_horse.name: Pain Au Chocolat
danger_horse.reason: Top stable with 2yos; likely to be well-educated.

selections.name: Philosopher
selections.reason: Fast 1000m specialist. Gets a huge weight swing on the top weight with the claim (down to ~60kg) and maps perfectly.

selections.name: Katsu
selections.reason: The class horse (Rating 90) but carries a massive weight (66kg before claim). Hard to concede that much weight to #2.

selections.name: Sparring
selections.reason: Consistent sprinter (Rating 75) who will be running on.

selections.name: Always Enuff
selections.reason: Honest mare who is rarely far away. Place hope.

danger_horse.name: Katsu
danger_horse.reason: Elite ability for this grade, only the weight is a concern.

selections.name: Snapshot
selections.reason: Unbeaten filly (2 from 2). Progressive profile and looks well-placed to continue the streak.

selections.name: No Limitation
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Group/Listed company. Rating 69 is superior to field.

selections.name: Frostnip
selections.reason: Price/Kent Jnr runner with a solid rating (66). Competitive.

selections.name: Discreet Point
selections.reason: Won maiden well. Draws the rail.

selections.name: Stage 'N' Screen
selections.reason: Standout rating (74) compared to rivals. Consistent form and looks the winner on paper.

selections.name: Cat Noir
selections.reason: Last start winner. Rating 66 puts her as the clear second pick.

selections.name: Charming Deel
selections.reason: Draws the rail. Consistent enough to place.

selections.name: Indian Jewel
selections.reason: Honest mare, likely to be around the mark for 3rd/4th.

selections.name: Lauding
selections.reason: Maher stable runner with the highest rating (73). Consistent in this grade.

selections.name: All So Clear
selections.reason: Hayes runner rating 70. Good barrier and solid form lines.

selections.name: The Western Front
selections.reason: Rating 69. Wide barrier is a slight concern but has ability.

selections.name: Sing For Peace
selections.reason: Quality stayer resuming. May need the run but class (71) keeps him in the mix.
